title: Long Form Editor for GERMAN Channel (Gathering HD, FITTING Clips and Add to VO with little editing) )
job_overview:
We're an upcoming German channel that makes videos about politics in Germany

Requirements:
Experience/Knowledge of editing
Ability to find fitting clips and sync them to the voice-over
Fast and reliable internet connection
Stable power supply
Minimum 8 hours/day, 5 days/week availability
Ability to handle high-volume work (2-3 videos/DAY)
QUICK turnaround times

Compensation:
$1.5/edited minute
Consistent workflow guaranteed

Technical Skills:
Video post-production and editing
Adding fitting music
Graphics integration
Effects and transitions
Retention Editing

This is a long term position with possibilities for growth as time goes on.
